Text: Haven't got the chance to try this yet... depending on the disk backup you have, you might need to fix the PS3TOC.TXT file.
Is this supposed to be codes or something for classic costumes and fatalities? And if so do you know of an xbox 360 version?

@TombRaider288 From what I know about this, it's not only the costumes/fatalities, it's the whole character that can be played with. When the game was sold, buying it from either Best Buy or other companies would let you with a special feature... one unique and old character. This trick enables all of them, no matter where the game was bought. I'm sure I could enable it also on the xbox. However, I don't own one, so I would need you to tell me a few things about the disk structure and then test it. If you are welling to do it, send me a mail.

iscy AT invalidip D0T [...] you should know the rest.

Your PS3 needs to be jailbroken! If it isnt and your above firmware 3.55 you cannot jail break. You need to transfer the files supplied into the folders as explained in the info either by usb stick or by ftp.

People, please read the damn file called "readme"!

I'll copy paste the line here again:
Just replace PS3TOC.TXT (USRDIR\) and COALESCED.INI (USRDIR\CONFIG\)
Works fine
